title: Jack and the Beanstalk
description: A favorite fairy tale brought vividly to life by Steven Kellogg's elaborate, classic artwork —perfect for a read-aloud pick! Join young Jack as he climbs a giant beanstalk to a magic castle in the clouds. Meet a hen that lays golden eggs and a harp that sings by itself. And don't forget the ogre... A classic fairy tale with rich and dynamic illustrations that will leave you chanting "Fee-fi-fo-fum!"
author: Steven Kellogg
